main.name: Ani Emmanuel
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React
main.bio: Hi there! I am Emmanuel! You might also know me as Rapoo. I've been coding for over 4 years now. As a Full Stack developer. good with React-Js, Typescript, Laravel and MySql. I've worked with startups and large corporations to help build & scale their companies. Along the journey I realised my passion existed in helping others excel and pursue their dreams as upcoming developers and most especially love building new ideas on different projects. With this passion, I have now built many projects and still working on building much more projects. I deliver REAL VALUE by teaching REAL WORLD projects to help students enter the world of web development. Youâ€™ll get hands-on experience and learn the skills that are required to succeed in the real-world and enjoy wonderful sites and applications built and delivered right on Time

work.title: Full Stack Developer/Web Instructor
work.description: This Is My Place Of Primary Assignment For My National Youth Service Corps (NYSC) I Thought Web Development, Also Work As A Full Stack Developer with Laravel and MySql

testimonials.text: Emmanuel is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Emmanuel has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
